description.en:
BLOX is a software development kit which aims at assisting video game developers with integrating the blockchain into their applications. Developing a decentralized application requires a lot of knowledge of blockchain technology such as wallets, transaction GAS fees, smart contracts et cetera.

The BLOX SDK aims to simplify the blockchain for both users and developers, providing a smooth website-builder like experience.
